ComicInfo.Summary:
A Love Story: Hellboy investigates a haunted World War II plane.
Theatre of the Dead: Abe Sapien & Hellboy take a break from fighting with Nazis and fight with some zombie gangsters instead.
Long Distance Caller: Johann Kraus tries to stop an alien from taking over a S.E.T.I. station.
Doc Hollow's Grand Vibro-Destructo Machine Episode 7:: Doc Hollow tries to stop his vibro-destructo machine from overloading.
ComicInfo.Teams: Zombies,Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense
